attributes.action: sign up to the Schengen convention
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The residents of most other European countries avoid unnecessary expense (in paying for a Passport) and delay, due to their governments having implimented the Schengen convention, which allows them to travel within the EU without a Passport.

Britain should sign up to this same convention, and save its citizens the time and cost.
